words.etymology: from kela (data) + turi (round/circular) — circular data reference

example.voku: Ka kela-turi kes pera eno miru-kela.
example.gloss: DECL circular-ref cause error in runtime
example.english: A circular reference causes a runtime error.

words.etymology: from lore (remember) + kela (data) — remembered data / memory

example.voku: Ka miru neke lore-kela poro take.
example.gloss: DECL process need memory for execute
example.english: The process needs memory to execute.

example.voku: Ka kule-kila take mani kiru-foma eno tema puli.
example.gloss: DECL processor execute many algorithm in time small
example.english: The processor executes many algorithms in a short time.

example.voku: Ka sol ule pine-foma poro kota ta kesi en fike-pu rapi ti.
example.gloss: DECL 1SG use design-pattern for code REL clean and fix-PASS fast
example.english: I use a design pattern for code that's clean and easy to fix.

example.voku: Ka hefa-supa tuve pe-du hefa ta take-me ti.
example.gloss: DECL cluster have five-two server REL work-RECIP
example.english: The cluster has twelve servers working together.

example.voku: Ka kela-voke sure mesa ta-tem kela mute-pu ti.
example.gloss: DECL webhook send message when data change-PASS
example.english: The webhook sends a message when data changes.

example.voku: Ka liku-reku pine vel ta reta-kufa pote hire eko vel ti.
example.gloss: DECL CORS define who REL web-app can request toward who
example.english: CORS defines which web apps can make cross-origin requests.
